address: Xã Gia Thanh, Huyện Phù Ninh, Tỉnh Phú Thọ
thought:
**Determining the New Ward for the Given Address**

Okay, so I've got "Xã Gia Thanh, Huyện Phù Ninh, Tỉnh Phú Thọ" to work with.  My first step, as always, is to break it down. I know the old province is "Tỉnh Phú Thọ" and the old ward is "Xã Gia Thanh".  

Next, I immediately think of the resolutions.  I checked resolution 60-NQ/TW, to see if there was any province-level rearrangement. Good news!  "Tỉnh Phú Thọ" is still "Tỉnh Phú Thọ", even after merging with other provinces. That makes my job a little easier.

Now, I shift my focus to finding the relevant resolution for ward-level changes within "Tỉnh Phú Thọ".  And there it is: "1676/NQ-UBTVQH15". Bingo!  Line 7 of this resolution is crucial: it explicitly states that "Xã Gia Thanh" is merged with a few other wards to form the new ward called "xã Dân Chủ".

To be absolutely sure, I then double-checked the "New wards" list, searching for "xã Dân Chủ". Yup, there it is!  With the ward code, and confirmed as being in "Tỉnh Phú Thọ".

So, the answer is crystal clear. I've got high confidence in this.  The new ward is "Xã Dân Chủ", ward code 08254, and it's located in "Tỉnh Phú Thọ".  The decisive citation is from line 7 of resolution 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15. I'm ready to package this up into the final JSON output.

citation.header: 1676/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Phú Thọ
citation.line: 7. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Bảo Thanh, Trị Quận, Hạ Giáp và Gia Thanh thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Dân Chủ.
